attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please enquire as to the progress & attendance by Tony Blair to his position as Special Representitive to the Middle East instead of making over-paid after-dinner speeches & a personal fortune.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
